sn6.4:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn6.4:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena bakassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti:
sn6.4:4.4: “idaṃ niccaṃ, idaṃ dhuvaṃ, idaṃ sassataṃ, idaṃ kevalaṃ, idaṃ acavanadhammaṃ, idañhi na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, ito ca panaññaṃ uttari nissaraṇaṃ natthī”ti.
sn6.4:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā bakassa brahmuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
sn6.4:5.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
sn6.4:5.5: Addasā kho bako brahmā bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn6.4:5.8: Cirassaṃ kho, mārisa, imaṃ pariyāyamakāsi yadidaṃ idhāgamanāya.
sn6.4:5.9: Idañhi, mārisa, niccaṃ, idaṃ dhuvaṃ, idaṃ sassataṃ, idaṃ kevalaṃ, idaṃ acavanadhammaṃ, idañhi na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati.
sn6.4:5.10: Ito ca panaññaṃ uttari nissaraṇaṃ natthī”ti.
sn6.4:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā bakaṃ brahmānaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.4:6.2: “avijjāgato vata bho bako brahmā, avijjāgato vata bho bako brahmā.
sn6.4:6.3: Yatra hi nāma aniccaṃyeva samānaṃ niccanti vakkhati, adhuvaṃyeva samānaṃ dhuvanti vakkhati, asassataṃyeva samānaṃ sassatanti vakkhati, akevalaṃyeva samānaṃ kevalanti vakkhati, cavanadhammaṃyeva samānaṃ acavanadhammanti vakkhati.
sn6.4:6.4: Yattha ca pana jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca, tañca tathā vakkhati:
sn6.4:6.5: ‘idañhi na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati’.
sn6.4:6.6: Santañca panaññaṃ uttari nissaraṇaṃ, ‘natthaññaṃ uttari nissaraṇan’ti vakkhatī”ti.
sn6.4:8.3: Sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānaṃ,
sn6.4:13.2: Sambuddhimantaṃ vatinaṃ amaññi;
sn6.4:14.2: Aññepi jānāsi tathā hi buddho;
